<b>Signature:</b>


|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [config](./rain-sdk.gatednftdeployarguments.config.md) | [GatedConfig](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.md) | Configuration of the basic information that will be added to the ERC721 NFT |
